channel.title: ESP3D-WEBUI :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: What is ESP3D-WEBUI ? ESP3D-WEBUI is a web interface designed to work with ESP3D, ESPDLib, ESP3D-TFT and grblHAL Warning The version to be used depend on firmware version itself, please refer to the firmware version page to know what Web UI to use.

item.title: Version 2.1.X
item.description: This version is the production version, features are frozen, only bugfixes are accepted. WebUI should support features of the following firmwares: Repetier 1.0/2.0 Marlin 1.X/2.X Smoothieware 1.x grbl 1.x The ESP3D-WEBUI 2.X must be used with ESP3D 2.X, ESP3DLib 1.X.

item.title: Version 3.X
item.description: This version is the development version. WebUI should support features of the following firmwares: Repetier 1.0/2.0 Marlin 1.X/2.X Smoothieware 1.x grbl 1.x grblHAL The ESP3D-WEBUI 3.X must be used with ESP3D 3.X, ESP3DLib 3.X and grblHAL It wonâ€™t work with older versions.
